EthicsApprovals: The study was approved by the Ethics Committee of the Department of Brain and Behavioral Sciences of the University of Pavia (protocol number 123/2023).
Funding: This work received support from the European Research Council under the EU’s Horizon Europe program ERC Consolidator Grant “PROcessing MEtaphors: Neurochronometry Acquisition and Decay (PROMENADE)” [101045733].
Name: ERC_CoG PROMENADE - WP2 - MetaImagery (Metaphor and Mental Imagery)
